title: Focus on the Audience
text: The primary goal of slide design is to focus on the audience's needs.

title: Clarity and Simplicity
text: Simplifying slides helps in making the information clearer and easier to understand.

title: Retention of Information
text: A well-designed slide aids in better retention of the presented information.

title: Avoiding Distractions
text: Reducing unnecessary elements on slides prevents distractions for the audience.

hintAnswer: To enhance audience understanding and retention.
title: Choosing the Best Option
text: The best option focuses on enhancing audience understanding and retention.
choices: To make the slides look more colorful.
To enhance audience understanding and retention.
To reduce the number of slides.
To impress the audience with design skills.
